Toggle Menu

salt.modules.netscaler

server_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_add(
								s_name,
								s_ip,
								s_state=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Add a server Note: The default server state is ENABLED

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_add 'serverName' 'serverIpAddress'
salt '*' netscaler.server_add 'serverName' 'serverIpAddress' 'serverState'

server_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_delete(
								s_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Delete a server

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_delete 'serverName'

server_disable

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_disable(
								s_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Disable a server globally

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_disable 'serverName'

server_enable

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_enable(
								s_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Enables a server globally

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_enable 'serverName'

server_enabled

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_enabled(
								s_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Check if a server is enabled globally

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_enabled 'serverName'

server_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_exists(
								s_name,
								ip=None,
								s_state=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a server exists

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_exists 'serverName'

server_update

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.server_update(
								s_name,
								s_ip,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Update a server's attributes

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.server_update 'serverName' 'serverIP'

service_disable

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.service_disable(
								s_name,
								s_delay=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Disable a service

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.service_disable 'serviceName'
salt '*' netscaler.service_disable 'serviceName' 'delayInSeconds'

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.service_enable(
								s_name,

								)

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.service_enable 'serviceName'

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.service_up(
								s_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a service is UP

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.service_up 'serviceName'

servicegroup_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_add(
								sg_name,
								sg_type='HTTP',
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Add a new service group If no service type is specified, HTTP will be used. Most common service types: HTTP, SSL, and SSL_BRIDGE

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_add 'serviceGroupName'
salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_add 'serviceGroupName' 'serviceGroupType'

servicegroup_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_delete(
								sg_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Delete a new service group

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_delete 'serviceGroupName'

servicegroup_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_exists(
								sg_name,
								sg_type=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a service group exists

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_exists 'serviceGroupName'

servicegroup_server_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_add(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Add a server:port member to a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_add 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

servicegroup_server_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_delete(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Remove a server:port member from a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_delete 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

servicegroup_server_disable

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_disable(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Disable a server:port member of a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_disable 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

servicegroup_server_enable

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_enable(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Enable a server:port member of a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_enable 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

servicegroup_server_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_exists(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Check if a server:port combination is a member of a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_exists 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

servicegroup_server_up

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.servicegroup_server_up(
								sg_name,
								s_name,
								s_port,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Check if a server:port combination is in state UP in a servicegroup

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.servicegroup_server_up 'serviceGroupName' 'serverName' 'serverPort'

vserver_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_add(
								v_name,
								v_ip,
								v_port,
								v_type,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Add a new lb vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_add 'vserverName' 'vserverIP' 'vserverPort' 'vserverType'
salt '*' netscaler.vserver_add 'alex.patate.chaude.443' '1.2.3.4' '443' 'SSL'

vserver_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_delete(
								v_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Delete a lb vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_delete 'vserverName'

vserver_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_exists(
								v_name,
								v_ip=None,
								v_port=None,
								v_type=None,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a vserver exists

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_exists 'vserverName'

vserver_servicegroup_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_add(
								v_name,
								sg_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Bind a servicegroup to a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_add 'vserverName' 'serviceGroupName'

vserver_servicegroup_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_delete(
								v_name,
								sg_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Unbind a servicegroup from a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_delete 'vserverName' 'serviceGroupName'

vserver_servicegroup_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_exists(
								v_name,
								sg_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a servicegroup is tied to a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_servicegroup_exists 'vserverName' 'serviceGroupName'

vserver_sslcert_add

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_sslcert_add(
								v_name,
								sc_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Binds a SSL certificate to a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_sslcert_add 'vserverName' 'sslCertificateName'

vserver_sslcert_delete

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_sslcert_delete(
								v_name,
								sc_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Unbinds a SSL certificate from a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_sslcert_delete 'vserverName' 'sslCertificateName'

vserver_sslcert_exists

Syntax

salt.modules.netscaler.vserver_sslcert_exists(
								v_name,
								sc_name,
								**connection_args
								)

Details

Checks if a SSL certificate is tied to a vserver

CLI Example:

salt '*' netscaler.vserver_sslcert_exists 'vserverName' 'sslCertificateName'
